Great article Will. In the early days of OpenID I preached long and hard about the reassignable identifier problem (which the OpenID community generally calls the recyclable identifier problem). But folks were not too worried about it -- the general attitude was, "We'll solve it when we get there."

As your article describes, if you wait until you get there, it's too late ;-)

Here's hoping the next generation of OpenID (the rumored OpenID v.next) gets non-recyclable identifier right.

=Drummond
